metadata.title: CVE-2020-8566 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In Kubernetes clusters using Ceph RBD as a storage provisioner, with logging level of at least 4, Ceph RBD admin secrets can be written to logs. This occurs in kube-controller-manager's logs during provisioning of Ceph RBD persistent claims. This affects < v1.19.3, < v1.18.10, < v1.17.13.

notes.note: leosilva> kubernates is in fact a kubernetes installer that calls snap, not the package it self.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
